meanings.definition: News or information about recent events.
meanings.sent1: The tidings of the storm reached us late.
meanings.sent2: She eagerly awaited the tidings of her friend's arrival.
meanings.sent3: The tidings of the missing cat being found brought relief to the family.
meanings.sent4: The tidings of the new job opportunity filled her with hope.
meanings.sent5: The tidings of the upcoming festival spread joy throughout the town.

meanings.definition: A message or communication of news.
meanings.sent1: He sent tidings of his safe arrival to his family.
meanings.sent2: The tidings of the victory were celebrated by all.
meanings.sent3: The tidings of the cancelled flight left them stranded at the airport.
meanings.sent4: Her face lit up upon receiving the tidings of her promotion.
meanings.sent5: The tidings of the birth of a baby brought smiles to everyone's faces.
